{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=WL-500g Premium |revision=v1 (R1.14) |asin=B0018CZZG8 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=discontinued |fcc_date=03/27/2006 |fcc_id=MSQWL500GP, MSQWL120GV2A |type=wireless router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4704;BCM4704KPBG, CT0542, P11, 757088, M5; |cpu1_cspeed=264 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL064A90TFI |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU281622ETP-6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes |wi1_module=ASUS WL-120g v2A |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318E;BCM4318EKFBG, HS0547, P20, 760839, N1; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG, RD0604, P11, 765129A, 5; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4-port USB Host Chip;VIA;VT6212L;VIA, VT6212L, G 0552CD, TAIWAN, 23B7005400;1; |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, FreshTomato, Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, TomatoUSB |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:17:3F |oui_eth=00:17:3F }} {{TagLine|Wireless Multi-Function Router}} :[http://www.asus.com/supportonly/WL500gP Support page] Default settings (including the SSID) are per '''ASUS''''s manual. *{{TechInfoDepot|Asus_WL-500g_Premium_v1}} (images) ===Links=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/wl500gp ''ASUS WL-500gP'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asus_routers ''ASUS'' routers on '''Wikipedia'''] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=542&num=1 ''ASUS WL-500g Premium'' Review on '''Phoronix'''] :00:17:3F OUI on the label, presumed to be used for both interfaces *[https://www.overclockers.ru/lab/23627/ASUS_WL-500g_Premium_bolshe_chem_prosto_router.html ''ASUS WL-500g Premium'' Review on '''Overclockers'''] (RU) *[https://geektimes.ru/post/256404/ ''Moding ASUS WL-500gP'' on '''Geektimes'''] (RU) ===Forum threads=== *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?5593-Photo-of-Asus-WL500g-Premium-MB-with-covers-removed-and-chips-specs ''Photo of Asus WL-500g Premium'' on '''wl500g.info'''] *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?14170-Exploring-WL500gP-hardware-expansion-interfacing-possibilities ''ASUS WL-500gP Hardware Mod'' on '''wl500g.info''']
